item.title: about me
item.description: education Bachelor of Applied Science in Honors Mechatronics Engineering with Co-op from the University of Waterloo, Waterloo, ON. (Class of 2022) skills the languages i’ve worked with (from most experience to least experience) are C# Python C++ C HLSL (Microsoft’s High-Level Shader Language) Java Go HTML, CSS, XML, Markdown Javascript SQL YAML the frameworks and libraries I’ve used are Unity NUnit, testNG ROS (Robot Operating System) Arduino Azure Jenkins Ansible Hugo Latex some of my other sills include

item.title: fun stuff i'm working on
item.description: If you want to see some of the code I’ve written, check out my Github profile. Pushover I’m currently working on a modernized version of the popular 90s video game Pushover with a colleague. In this puzzle game, the user plays an ant who needs to rearrange dominos to get them to all fall over. This remake will have a creative mode where the user can build their own levels. It is being written in Unity.

item.title: get in touch
item.description: The best way to contact me is through email. You can reach me at camille.h.walters@gmail.com Alternatively, you can find me on LinkedIn here.
